sentences.sentence: Entries which are illegible or otherwise not in accordance with the rules will be disqualified.
sentences.translation: 难以辨认的或不符合这些规定的参赛作品将被取消资格。

sentences.sentence: Her signature was an illegible scrawl.
A missing or illegible name will nullify your vote.
sentences.translation: 遗漏或字迹难以辨认的名字会使你的投票无效。
